title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 26 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 26 2022
description:
Fake news take our Trump interview totally out of context, claim he praised Putin. If you want everything that happens on this show in context, go to ClayAndBuck.com. C&B play the Trump sound bite the media is dishonestly spinning. Buck says this makes him realize he misses the term "fake news," and he wants it brought back. Clay says it's laughable that fake news denigrate C&B show, when "beyond a shadow of a doubt," the audience is bigger than theirs. Georgia Senate candidate, football great Herschel Walker talks with Clay and Buck about flipping the Senate red. Peter Doocy exposes Psaki on climate change and Russia. 98% of LA prosecutors want to recall DA Gascon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
